Title: Relates to establishing a payroll tax for the purpose of child care for families with children under three years of age within certain counties
Summary: Establishes a payroll tax in the counties of Onondaga, Madison, Cortland, Oswego and Cayuga on certain employers for the purposes of addressing child care affordability, accessibility, and quality for families with children under three years of age.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a payroll tax for the purpose of child care for families with children under three years of age within certain counties; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
